participant_1.background:
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died.

participant_2.background:
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my job
i eat all take out.
i have a marketing job.
i have always had long hair.
my hobbies include reading and cycling.

content.text: I work as a marketing manager.
Oh what's your favorite part of that job?
I love the creativity and the opportunity to work with so many different people.
That's so cool. I love reading and cycling. What's your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into sci-fi and fantasy right now.
Oh cool. I've read a few sci-fi books, but not many fantasy. What are some of your favorites?
I really enjoyed the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy series by Douglas Adams and the Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien.
I've heard good things about those books. I'll have to check them out.
Yeah, you definitely should.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem.
I know you have a kid. How old are they?
They're two years old.
Aww, that's so cute.
Yeah, he's a handful.
I bet. How are you liking being a parent?
It's definitely the most challenging thing I've ever done, but it's also the most rewarding.
That's great to hear.
Yeah, I love being a parent.
I'm sure your kid is lucky to have you.
Thanks, I appreciate that
